imdb.plot outline: Fisherman's Handbook is hosted by veteran angler and outdoorsman Wade Middleton, just one of many top anglers in the world who will bring you the how-to, why-to and where-to when it comes to fishing some of the best destinations in the world. On every episode you'll be treated to a mix of informative tips, topics and situations that will help you be a better fisherman - whether you're a first time angler or a seasoned pro, you'll be armed with knowledge of where to go and how to catch them on your next fishing trip!
imdb.title: Fisherman's Handbook
plot: _Fisherman's Handbook_ (qv) is hosted by veteran angler and outdoorsman Wade Middleton, just one of many top anglers in the world who will bring you the how-to, why-to and where-to when it comes to fishing some of the best destinations in the world. On every episode you'll be treated to a mix of informative tips, topics and situations that will help you be a better fisherman - whether you're a first time angler or a seasoned pro, you'll be armed with knowledge of where to go and how to catch them on your next fishing trip!::CarecoTV
